oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The Multi-stakeholder Centre
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Ssekyewa, Charles
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Farming Systems
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This is a new idea for the research stream. The UN in its discussion of the Sustainable Development Agenda after 2015, could consider it as one way to ensure that research contributes to achievement of the agenda. The writer is willing to participate in the process of shaping this idea further for the benefit of Sustainable Development in the World, and especially in Africa.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Ssekyewa, Charles (2014) The Multi-stakeholder Centre. In: Rahmann, G. and Aksoy, U. (Eds.) Building Organic Bridges, Johann Heinrich von Thünen-Institut, Braunschweig, Germany, 4, Thuenen Report, no. 20, pp. 1127-1130.
